title: Portuguese - Portugal B1 (Intermediate)
overview: The Portuguese - Portugal B1 (Intermediate) test evaluates a candidate’s Portuguese proficiency at the B1 level of the CEFR framework. This test will help you hire employees who can communicate in Portuguese on subjects commonly encountered at work.
